cause.description:
The North Carolina FFA Foundation, headquartered at North Carolina State University, provides financial support and public awareness for agricultural education and FFA. Working closely with business and industry, agricultural commodity groups, individuals, and various organizations the North Carolina FFA Foundation raises funds to recognize FFA achievements and to support activities at local, state and national levels. Private contributions go directly to those who will make it count—FFA members. The North Carolina FFA Foundation operates under the auspices of the North Carolina Agricultural Foundation, Inc. which is a nonprofit, charitable and educational foundation as defined in Internal Revenue Service code 501(c)3.
1. Promote and Support the North Carolina FFA Members
2. Provide scholarships, awards and recognition to deserving FFA members.
3. Promote Agricultural Education
cause.mission: NC FFA Foundation raises financial support to make a positive difference in the lives of students by developing premier leadership, personal growth & career success through Ag Education
